text: Heidi Karen Turk married name Heidi Wood (1961-2012), was a female swimmer who competed for Great Britain and England. ==Swimming career== Turk represented England and won a silver medal in the 4 x 100 metres freestyle relay, at the 1978 Commonwealth Games in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2012 deaths Category:English female swimmers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in swimming Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Swimmers at the 1978 Commonwealth Games
title: Heidi Turk
